forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a morning shower. Morning fog, then cloudy this afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a morning shower. Overcast. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 53F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
